premise_source_doc_sentence: The short was released on November 15 , 2011 , on DVD and Blu-ray , along with Gift of the Night Fury , another short film based on the Dragons .

claim: Gift of the Night Fury stars the voice of an elderly Canadian producer.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Although initially dismissed as a clumsy and underweight misfit , he soon becomes renowned as a courageous expert in dragons , beginning with Toothless , a member of the rare Night Fury breed as his flying mount and his closest companion .
